title: Hours spent on the game
body: Can you tell me how much time I have spent on LoL. I plan to spend the same amount of time on it everyday for a while so I want to know how much time I have spent on this game,

replies.body:
WoL was essentially an estimate anyway, so if you want to manually estimate the amount of time you've spent playing League of Legends, after your next ARAM and Summoner's Rift normal match, copy down your wins and losses. Add them all together and multiply them by roughly 25 minutes, or 0.5 hours. Take this number and add it to the time on WoL, and you'll have a decent estimate!

- And Twisted Treeline, if applicable

You have spent ~110 hours in League, just for ranked games. 

There is a site called "[wasted on LoL](https://wol.gg/stats/oce/senpaitd/)" that tells you this kind of info. Unfortunately due to recent changes in API the site is no longer able to tell you how many hours all up including normal games.
I don't feel like that is correct as I have played over 1k ranked games this season alone..... if we push flex out i still have at least 700-800 games in solo/duo.
